post.body: awesome! thanks.
understood. in my mind it would be much easier to manage something that you've worked with yourself. more like the common man.
and you also wouldn't have as much hell doing your job.
ok. thats interesting because i would think that if you are familiar with the tech then you'd know what's possible
thanks for the RT. do you have any thoughts on that? :)
work in the which sense? managing, communication, or grunt work?
do they usually come from a similar background of the people they are working with or a totally different industry?
are you looking for a fulltime or parttime designer?
thanks to everyone that gave their responses. very much appreciated.
what would be the next logical step after becoming a senior web developer? project manager? any thoughts?
